title: Did the Mayor of Alabama Mark Chambers contact the killing of lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) persons?
subtitle: Some appeal to Chambers to resign after the comment has given rise to controversy over his small community.

vclaim: Mark Chambers, Mayor of Carbon Hill, Alaa, wrote on Facebook that members of the LGBT community must "kill."
